Package arima

Class ARMA

java.lang.Object
arima.AR
arima.ARMA
public class ARMA extends AR
Class to solve an ARMA-Model using a linear regression. First solving the AR part of the model and subsequently solving the MA part, both with an OLS regression, minimizing the sum of squared errors. By solving the AR part, we obtain the p parameter values and with these we can calculate the predicted values and thus the residuals for all observations.
Author:
Christoph Barkey, Andrej Muschke

    • forecast

      public Observation[] forecast(Observation[] observations, int h, boolean all)
      Description copied from class: AR
      Method to forecast the h next steps Creates forecast values and prints them directly. The user can decide if he/she wants to store all observations or only the forecasts.
      Overrides:
      forecast in class AR
      Parameters:
      observations - array of observations
      h - periods to forecast
      all - if true -> return observation + forecasts
      Returns:
      forecast or observations + forecasts
